bio.aliases: Iron Knight, Hogan Potts, Spare Parts Man, Cobalt Man II, Crimson Dynamo, Ironman
bio.nicknames: Tony Stark, Shellhead, The Golden Avenger, Tetsujin, Tin Man
bio.occupation: Inventor, Industrialist; former United States Secretary of Defense
bio.groupAffiliation: Avengers, Illuminati, Stark Resilient; formerly S.H.I.E.L.D., leader of Stark Enterprises, the Pro-Registration Superhero Unit, New Avengers, Mighty Avengers, Hellfire Club, Force Works, Avengers West Coast, United States Department of Defense.
bio.relatives: Howard Anthony Stark (father, deceased), Maria Stark (mother, deceased), Morgan Stark (cousin), Isaac Stark (ancestor)
